DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To evaluate response rate patient locally advanced metastatic , unresectable refractory thyroid cancer treat everolimus . Secondary - To evaluate overall survival patient treat everolimus . - To evaluate progression-free survival patient . - To evaluate toxicity therapy patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive oral everolimus daily day 1-28 . Treatment repeat every 28 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Blood sample collect periodically correlative study . After completion study treatment , patient follow 12 month .
